security

Class InputValidators

  • java.lang.Object
    • security.InputValidators

  • public class InputValidators
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the methods for input validation using REGEX.
    How to Use:
    Public use consists of only the public constants and the public method validate.
    Call the validate method and pass the type of the input and the value.
    type can be any of the public Constants (EMAIL, NAME, etc.), it determines which regex to use.
    value is the string to match against the regex pattern.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public static boolean validate(java.lang.String type,
                               java.lang.String value)
        checks if the given value matches the regex of the given type.
        Parameters:
        type - - type of input (one of the public constants EMAIL, NAME, etc.)
        value - - the value to check against the regex.
        Returns:
        boolean - the value matches/does not match the regex.
